title: Strengthening Medical Practical Competencies: University-Industry Collaboration for Global PLM Strategy Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of product development processes, foundational PLM concepts, and global supply chain management
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze core elements of a global PLM (Product Lifecycle Management) strategy—design, production, distribution, and disposal—and integrate them into instructional design.
Learners can design a PLM education curriculum and develop a prototype based on university-industry collaboration cases.
Learners can conduct a PLM simulation workshop using digital tools and measure participants' improved understanding.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
